author: Mike Chiari
title: Tee Higgins Writes Inspiring Letter About His Mom's Past, Being Ready for NFL
description: Former Clemson wide receiver and 2020  NFL  draft prospect  Tee Higgins  shared the story of his upbringing and how his mother turned her life around in a letter for  The Players' Tribune  on Tuesday...
content:

Former Clemson wide receiver and 2020 NFL draft prospect Tee Higgins shared the story of his upbringing and how his mother turned her life around in a letter for The Players' Tribune on Tuesday.
